provider-guidelines:
Dear Provider,

Welcome to FIX&GO ‚Äî your trusted partner for roadside assistance services. Before completing your registration, please review the following guidelines:

1. Subscription Fee:
- A monthly subscription fee of 500 EGP is required to access and use the platform.

2. Service Listings & Pricing:
- All services must be listed and managed through the FIX&GO app.
- Minimum prices are set by FIX&GO to ensure fairness and transparency.
- Customers pay you in cash directly after the service is completed.
- Make sure your prices account for the transaction fees.

3. Transaction Fees:
- A fee of 10%‚Äì15% is applied to each completed service request.

4. Response Time:
- Providers are expected to respond promptly to incoming service requests to ensure high-quality customer service.

5. Availability:
- Keep your availability status updated in the app to avoid delays or missed opportunities.

6. Active Request Limit:
- You can have up to 3 active service requests at a time to ensure performance and quality.

7. Emergency Auto-Assignment:
- In emergency situations, if no provider accepts a request within a short time, the nearest available provider may be automatically assigned.

8. Licensing & Insurance:
- You must have all required licenses and insurance to legally provide roadside assistance services.

9. Customer Interaction:
- Maintain professionalism, clear communication, and respectful behavior with customers at all times.

10. App Usage:
- All requests, communication, and payment tracking must occur within the FIX&GO app.

By completing your registration, you agree to these guidelines and commit to delivering reliable, professional service.

‚Äî The FIX&GO Team

customer-guidelines:
Before You Join FIX&GO

Dear Customer,

Welcome to FIX&GO ‚Äî we‚Äôre happy to have you onboard!
Before completing your registration, please read and accept the following terms regarding service pricing:

‚∏ª

üí≥ Minimum Charge Policy

When you request a service through FIX&GO, the amount you pay via the app credit card is a minimum charge to secure your request and notify nearby providers.

‚∏ª

üíµ Final Payment in Cash

The full cost of the service is only determined after the provider reaches your location and performs the job.
You will need to pay the remaining balance in cash directly to the provider based on the actual service delivered.

‚∏ª

By completing your sign-up, you confirm that you understand and agree to this pricing policy.

Let‚Äôs get you back on the road, safely and quickly!
‚Äî The FIX&GO Team
